view

Class GameEngineCallbackImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameEngineCallbackImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    view.interfaces.GameEngineCallback

    public class GameEngineCallbackImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements view.interfaces.GameEngineCallback
    Skeleton/Partial example implementation of GameEngineCallback showing Java logging behaviour
    Author:
    Caspar Ryan
    See Also:
    GameEngineCallback

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameEngineCallbackImpl() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bustCard(model.interfaces.Player player, model.interfaces.PlayingCard card, model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
      called when the card causes the player to bust this method is called instead of GameEngineCallback.nextCard(Player, PlayingCard, GameEngine) this method is called before GameEngineCallback.result(Player, int, GameEngine) use this to update your display for each card or log to console
      void houseBustCard(model.interfaces.PlayingCard card, model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
      HOUSE version of GameEngineCallback.bustCard(Player, PlayingCard, GameEngine)
      void houseResult(int result, model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
      called when the HOUSE has bust with final result (result is score prior to the last card that caused the bust) PRE-CONDITION: This method should only be called AFTER bets have been updated on all Players so this callback can log Player results Called from GameEngine.dealHouse(int)
      void nextCard(model.interfaces.Player player, model.interfaces.PlayingCard card, model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
      called for each card as the house is dealing to a Player, use this to update your display for each card or log to console
      void nextHouseCard(model.interfaces.PlayingCard card, model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
      called as the house is dealing their own hand, use this to update your display for each card or log to console
      void result(model.interfaces.Player player, int result, model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
      called when the player has bust with final result (result is score prior to the last card that caused the bust)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public void nextCard(model.interfaces.Player player,
                     model.interfaces.PlayingCard card,
                     model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
        Description copied from interface: view.interfaces.GameEngineCallback
        called for each card as the house is dealing to a Player, use this to update your display for each card or log to console
        Specified by:
        nextCard in interface view.interfaces.GameEngineCallback
        Parameters:
        player - the Player who is receiving cards
        card - the next card that was dealt
        engine - a convenience reference to the engine so the receiver can call methods if necessary
        See Also:
        GameEngine

        Parameters:

        result - the final score of the hand

      • houseResult

        public void houseResult(int result,
                        model.interfaces.GameEngine engine)
        Description copied from interface: view.interfaces.GameEngineCallback
        called when the HOUSE has bust with final result (result is score prior to the last card that caused the bust) PRE-CONDITION: This method should only be called AFTER bets have been updated on all Players so this callback can log Player results Called from GameEngine.dealHouse(int)
        Specified by:
        houseResult in interface view.interfaces.GameEngineCallback
        Parameters:
        result - the final score of the dealers (house) hand
